titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to remove lifetime limits under State Medicaid programs on medication-assisted treatment for substance use disorders.
Medication-Assisted Treatment Improvement Act
Medication-Assisted Treatment Improvement Act
Medication-Assisted Treatment Improvement Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Medication-Assisted Treatment Improvement Act
This bill prohibits states from imposing lifetime limits on Medicaid coverage of medication-assisted treatment for substance use disorders.
